body.name: LINSY HOME 7 Drawer Double Dresser, SGS Certified Dresser for Bedroom, Mid Century Modern Dresser Chest with Wide Drawers, Wood Storage Chest of Drawers for Living Room
body.stockDetail: Only 17 left in stock - order soon.
features: 【MORDERN DESIGN】: Made of P2 Board, various decoration styles are compatible with this modern minimalist sdrawer chest. Adding concave and convex lines to the simple monochromatic wood panel adds a certain interest and advanced aesthetics to this product. Create a minimalist but not rigid living environment.

【REFINED CRAFTSMANSHIP】 Different from the surface sticker craftsmanship, LINSY HOME storage drawer adopts full edge-sealing craftsmanship. Strictly edge-sealed panels not only make the drawer feel smoother, but also are less prone to breakage and have better durability.

【SPACE SAVING】 7 widened and enlarged drawers provide spacious storage space for your trivial sundries and meet your storage needs in every possible way. The traditional handles have been replaced by double-cut hidden gold metal handles. Reduce the safety hazards in daily life. Saves the inconvenience of installing handles. Stylish and simple.
【 SMOOTH GLIDE】 Premium metal slides that can be pushed and pulled smoothly, that make opening the drawers easy even when your hands are full with baby.

【Anti-Falling】Anti-falling accessory included preventing injury from unexpected tipping of furniture. The back of the Drawer dresser is also equipped with a stabilizing device, which makes the dresser more stable and durable.
body.description: LINSY HOME 7 Drawer Dresser A good helper to make your home tidy This dresser offers roomy space for storing out of season clothing, shoes, purses, scarves, bedding, linens, and more. The classic fabric adds stylish storage to any bedroom closet, laundry area or other storage space in your home. Color: Brown Style:Farmhouse Product Size: 15.67"D x 47.24"W x 31.38"H Drawer Size: 11.8"D x20.8"W x 8.7"H Max. Static Load Capacity of the Tabletop: 44.09 lb (20 kg) Max. Static Load Capacity of Each Drawer: 55.11 lb (25 kg)

Q1: Where could I get the instruction manual A: Instruction manual is included on the package and you can also download the PDF version on the product page. Q2: What is assembly like? Easy/difficult? Most challenging parts? What tools are required and how many hands? A: Assembly is straightforward, but there are quite a few pieces which makes it SEEM more daunting. The six drawer boxes need to be assembled. You will need flat head and Phillips head screwdrivers and a hammer. One person can assemble this, but two will make it go faster! Put on some music and allow enough time so you are not rushed. :) Q3: What is the dimension of the dresser? A: The dimensions of the dresser is 15.67"D x 47.24"W x 31.38"H. Q4: What is the dimension of the drawer? A: The dimensions of the drawer is 11.8"D x20.8"W x 8.7"H

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product better than described!
reviews.reviewText: This dresser gets the A+ rating from me primarily for the ease of use of the directions and for not only using screws, but including the screw driver! Only 1 piece had to be tightened with the dreaded allen wrench. The pictures were very clear and easy to follow despite my preference for written directions, I had no issues following along. I was able to assemble all of it alone, and only required a second set of hands to upright the unit for the finishing steps. The quality of the predrilled holes is a key part to aligning pieces and being able to keep an item square, and they were spot on. The drawer slides are nice feature for the price point. The finish and even the hardware are sleek and perfect for a teenager's room. I did take my time and spent several hours assembling the unit over 2 days, but I binged a few shows and there was not one bad word uttered- the first time ever assembling anything!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Dresser drawer system
reviews.reviewText: Very strong, heavy, nice look. I love how the drawer slides out on tracks then stops at the end. And the tracks help pull the drawer fully closed and smooth.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It's about what you'd expect for the price
reviews.reviewText: There's the saying you get what you pay for. Pretty much holds true for this. It's an inexpensive purchase and you get the quality of what you paid for. It looks nice and pretty true to the online pictures. It's smaller than what it might seem from the pictures, but true to the listed measurements. The hardware used to put it together is very low quality and you have to be careful to not bend or break something. One nice touch is that they send a package of extra pieces.It's built, it looks decent. We'll see if it holds up to regular usage by a child. Overall, seems decent for the price so far.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The dresser took quite a lot of time to put together. Once I got another person to help me it went much faster. I didn't time it, but in all, it was probably a few hours. You have to be careful because it is easily scratched. The directions were fairly obvious. It looks very nice & it's functional.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Merchandise that could not be used properly
reviews.reviewText: One of the drawers holes were drilled wrong. You couldn’t put it together right we tried to contact the company several times and then when they returned our email, they sent the wrong item wrong color. It was an absolute nightmare, asked for a refund because it was supposed to be a Christmas gift. They told me there would be one and here it is over a month later. I have contacted Amazon every day and I get nowhere, horrible Customer Service

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased 2 of these as nightstands. They’re taller than nightstands but we like the 4 drawers. You can’t beat the price of these either. Trust me I did the research. The quality is very good.NOW as far as putting it together…Not gonna lie. It took a while. Like 4 hours.Keep in mind that this is not wood. It looks like wood but for the price you can’t expect it to be.You get directions and all the pieces you need to assemble but if you don’t have patience, have a friend do it for you!We also purchased the matching 8 drawer dresser. I don’t know why this is advertised as baby furniture because it works for adults too!!Just a little side note…. I ordered 2 dressers together. I got 1 shipping notification for both. On delivery day i only received 1. I immediately contacted seller and they got back to me right away!! They said they did ship together but FedEx for some reason decided to deliver on 2 different days. Seller provided the other tracking and I received it next day.Overall i am extremely happy with my order. The customer service is excellent and i will definitely purchase from here again and yes i would highly recommend ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Rating this item a 3 star because of delivery. My item was not delivered at my address. They left it behind the steps downstairs. I am assuming because I stay upstairs they did not want to deliver it to the correct address. However, the dresser is very sturdy and easy to put together. The screws does not go all the way in for the handles, so the handles moves a lot. I probably wouldn’t recommend this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good assembly instructions. Great look and value.
reviews.reviewText: The product looks great the drawers open with ease! Great value!
